message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for a limited time at $13,000. I know that's a great price for this high-quality product. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase your product. However, I am only willing to pay up to $9,500 for it. I hope this aligns better with your expectations.
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $9,500 is too low for me. I'm willing to come down to $11,500.  This is a very competitive price for this product, and I'm sure you'll be happy with it.

Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I understand your position, but I believe we can find common ground. I am willing to pay $10,000 for the product. I hope this meets somewhere in between our expectations.
